name: Slime on Hole
description:
This is my entry for the Brackeys 2020.1 which theme was "HOLES". 

You are just a slime that is being captured by humans, humans capture slimes and throw them in to holes so that there god bless them with wealth and happiness. You as the slime need to survive by dodging obstacles and see how far you get.

The controls are in the game, but still the controls are:

A: Left

D:Right

There are 3 types of medals:

Copper: reach a score of 10

Silver: reach a score of 50

Gold: reach a goal of 150 

lets see what it takes for you to obtain them!
